title: Galactic Civilizations II Gold Edition [2007|RUS] 1C
description:
Galactic Civilizations II Gold Edition [RUSSIAN only] 1C

Game type: 4X strategy              Translated by: Snowball
Version: 1.80f                      Date: 2007-02-07
Size: 2 CD                          Protection: No


Game Notes 
~~~~~~~~~~
The year is 2225. The galaxy is on fire as the evil Drengin Empire and their allies battle for control of the galaxy against a coalition of free civilizations led by the Terran Alliance. Dominate the galaxy through military might economic power cultural expansion technological achievement or political prowess in this 4X strategy game.

Play as the Terran Alliance or as one of 9 alien races -- or create your own.

Design your own ships both in how they look and how they function and watch them do battle.

Advanced diplomatic options give players more options for victory.

Unique worlds, asteroid fields, epic events, and more help make each game a whole new experience 

Two campaigns
The Dread Lords (the war of 2225) and The Dark Avatar (after math of 2226) puts the player in the middle of the action.

Versions available include the original Galactic Civilizations II: Dread Lords, the expansion pack Galactic Civilizations II: Dark Avatar and the compilation of the two together Galactic Civilizations II: Gold Edition.


Install Notes
~~~~~~~~~~~~~
1. Mount or Burn iso
2. Install
3. Play
